com.maingame.game.sprites

Class Boat

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.maingame.game.sprites.Boat

  • public class Boat
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to hold all the logic and attribute for boats

    • Method Detail

      • isBoatOutOfLane

        public void isBoatOutOfLane()
        Checks if a boat is outside of its lane. If yes, it decreases the penaltyBar.

      • setBounds

        public void setBounds(float leftBound,
                      float rightBound)
        Sets the lane limits for a boat.
        Parameters:
        leftBound - a float of where the boat lane starts
        rightBound - a float of where the boat lane ends

      • update

        public void update(float dt)
        Changes the current texture used for a boat to provide an animation.
        Parameters:
        dt - the time between each start of a render()

      • hasCollided

        public void hasCollided(java.util.List<Boat> boats,
                        Boat player)
        Checks if a boat has hit another boat and decreases the boat's health.
        Parameters:
        boats - the list of boats excluding the player's boat
        player - the player boat
